Recent updates from New York City include tragic flooding incidents resulting in two deaths, a shooting in Hell's Kitchen, and the upcoming mayoral election highlighting issues like school control and housing. Additionally, NYC is launching emergency food efforts amid SNAP benefit cuts and advancing major redevelopment projects.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC flooding has resulted in the deaths of two men in flooded basements in Manhattan and Brooklyn. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
